name: GHOST PORTRAIT #18 - Portrait of Carthusian
description:
Experimental 3d Displacement mapping applied to classical portraits. 
Portrait of a Carthusian is a 1446 painting in oils on oak panel by the early Dutch painter Petrus Christus. The work is part of the Jules Bache Collection housed at the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City.
JPEG 6000 x 4186 px, 300 DPI
